Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Intro”, in which Miyazawa meets a beautiful woman Izusa and falls in love; and “Second Childhood,” in which Miyazawa falls in love again. The story follows Miyazawa through his short, but fulfilling life.
